WRITING.TEXT: The same goes with video games? Do you play them in chronological order or when they were made? Example:Kingdom Hearts or Metroid?

WRITING.TEXT: For example Star Wars. Do you watch New hope, Empire, Return and then the prequels? Or prequels first?
